errors.forbidden: Nta burenganzira ufite bwo gukora iki gikorwa.

errors.invalid_credentials: Imeli cyangwa ijambo ry'ibanga ntabwo ari ryo
errors.email_verification_required: Nyamuneka wemeza imeli yawe mbere yo kwinjira
errors.account_suspended: Konti yawe yahagaritswe. Nyamuneka wongera uhamagara ubuyobozi
errors.account_locked: Konti yahagaritswe kubera ko wagerageje kwinjira cyane
errors.invalid_reset_token: Icyemezo cyo gusubira ijambo ry'ibanga ntabwo ari ryo
errors.invalid_refresh_token: Icyemezo cyo kuvugurura ntabwo ari cyiza
errors.too_many_registration_attempts: Wagerageje kwiyandikisha inshuro nyinshi. Ongera ugerageze nyuma

success.registration_complete: Kwiyandikisha byagenze neza! Nyamuneka wemeze imeli yawe
success.email_verified: Imeli yemejwe neza! Ubutumwa bwo kwakira bukoherejwe
success.password_reset_otp_verified: Icyemezo cyemejwe! Ubu rero urashobora kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga
success.password_reset_token_verified: Icyemezo cyo kuvugurura ijambo ry'ibanga cyemejwe neza
